briefTitle: Tissue Resistivity in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Minimally Invasive Procedure for the Discrimination of Tissue Resistivity in Breast Cancer Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \>18 years
* First radiological diagnosis of breast adenocarcinoma needing a histological confirmation
* Written Informed Consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Tumor mass diameter \< 1 cm
* Surgical specimen (harbouring tumoral + peritumoral tissue) diameter \< 2 cm
